articles.description: In past 10 years, out of 33 employees in the tech team, only two have left, says the firm's CTO.
articles.content: Amid the global layoffs and people looking for options to change firms, retaining the talented employees has been a great challenge for companies. However, online stock trading firm Zerodha's CTO Kai… [+1661 chars]

articles.title: Mahindra Bolero And Bolero Neo Get More Expensive By Up To Rs 31,000 - CarDekho
articles.description: The Bolero gets a bigger hike than the Bolero Neo, not all variants are affected     Mahindra has hiked prices of the Bolero by up to Rs 31,000.    It’s now priced between Rs 9.78 lakh and Rs 10.79 lakh.    Prices of the Bolero Neo have been bumped up uniform…
articles.content:
